flavorText: "I and my kin remember the old ways. The frost whispers to me in a language too ancient for the Skoti usurpers to comprehend."

foreignData.flavorText: „Ich und meine Sippe erinnern uns an die alten Zeiten. Der Frost flüstert mir in einer Sprache zu, die zu alt ist, als dass die Skoti-Thronräuber sie verstehen könnten."
foreignData.name: Winterformerin
foreignData.text: {T}: Enttappe ein verschneites Land deiner Wahl.

foreignData.flavorText: "Yo y los míos recordamos las viejas costumbres. El hielo me habla en un idioma demasiado antiguo como para que los usurpadores skoti lo comprendan".
foreignData.name: Escultora de invierno

foreignData.flavorText: « Mes congénères et moi, nous nous souvenons des anciennes traditions. Le givre murmure dans une langue si ancienne que les usurpateurs skoti ne peuvent pas la comprendre. »
foreignData.name: Sculpteuse de l'hiver

foreignData.flavorText: "Io e la mia gente ricordiamo le antiche usanze. Il gelo mi sussurra in una lingua così antica che gli usurpatori Skoti non possono comprenderla."
foreignData.name: Scultrice dell'Inverno

foreignData.flavorText: 「私の類縁は古のやり方を覚えている。成り上がりのスコーティには理解できない古い言葉で霜がささやいている。」
foreignData.name: 冬を彫る者
foreignData.text: {T}：氷雪土地１つを対象とする。それをアンタップする。
foreignData.type: 氷雪クリーチャー — エルフ・ならず者

foreignData.flavorText: "나와 내 동족은 옛 방식을 기억하지. 서리는 스코티 강탈자들이 이해하기에는 너무 오래된 언어로 내게 속삭인다."
foreignData.name: 겨울 조각가
foreignData.text: {T}: 눈 대지를 목표로 정한다. 그 대지를 언탭한다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Eu e meu povo recordamos os costumes antigos. A geada sussurra para mim em uma língua antiga demais para ser compreendida pelos usurpadores Skoti."
foreignData.name: Escultora de Invernos
foreignData.text: {T}: Desvire o terreno da neve alvo.

foreignData.flavorText: «Я и мой род — мы помним старые пути. Мороз шепчет мне на языке, слишком древнем, чтобы его могли понять узурпаторы Скоти».
foreignData.name: Ваятельница Зимы

foreignData.flavorText: 「我和族人依旧记得古法。冰霜用着斯科提逆神一族无法理解的古老语言，向我述说一切。」
foreignData.name: 凛冬塑师

foreignData.flavorText: 「我和族人依舊記得古法。冰霜用著斯科提逆神一族無法理解的古老語言，向我述說一切。」
foreignData.name: 凜冬塑師

name: Sculptor of Winter

rulings.text: Sculptor of Winter’s activated ability is not a mana ability. It can’t be activated while casting a spell or activating an ability. It uses the stack and can be responded to.
Snow is a supertype, not a card type. It has no rules meaning or function by itself, but spells and abilities may refer to it.
The {S} symbol is a generic mana symbol. It represents a cost that can be paid by one mana that was produced by a snow source. That mana can be any color or colorless.
Snow isn’t a type of mana. If an effect says you may spend mana as though it were any type, you can’t pay for {S} using mana that wasn’t produced by a snow source.
Some cards have additional effects for each {S} spent to cast them. You can cast these spells even if you don’t spend any snow mana to cast them; their additional effects simply won’t do anything.

The Kaldheim set doesn’t have any cards with mana costs that include {S}, but some previous sets do. If an effect says such a spell costs {1} less to cast, that reduction doesn’t apply to any {S} costs. This is also true for activated abilities that include {S} in their activation costs and effects that reduce those costs.
